events.message: The customer reported an accident involving their car hitting a pole on April 30th and filed the claim promptly.
Upon initial review, the claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to vehicle collision causing front-end damage.
An agent specializing in auto insurance claims has been assigned to handle the case and will initiate further procedures.
The customer received confirmation that the claim was officially acknowledged, ensuring the process is underway.
The agent requested photos of the vehicle damage and a police report to support the investigation of the collision.
Customer uploaded all required documents including vehicle photos and official accident report as requested.
The investigation team began review of the submitted evidence and will assess liability and damage estimates.
Investigation concluded successfully, confirming the accident details and damage claims as valid and covered.
A settlement amount has been proposed based on damage evaluations and policy coverage for the vehicle repairs.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the clear communication.
The claim has been officially approved following the customer's acceptance of the settlement offer.
Payment for the approved settlement was processed and issued to the customer's designated bank account.
The claim was closed successfully after payment, with the customer confirming resolution and no further issues.
All claim documents and communications have been archived for record-keeping and future reference.
